response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be far beyond $12,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price that reflects both the product's quality and my desire to make it accessible to you. My offer is $15,000. I trust this investment will pay off in numerous ways for you. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
